name: Cooking Games: Food Voyage
description:
Food Voyage - Cooking Games
This Ultimate cooking game contains endless events and restaurant levels for those who are crazy about cooking games.

Are you thrilled about remodeling & designing your yacht and going across the world to develop your restaurant empire and food chain? Then Food voyage games are for you. Cook as a talented cooking chef! Display your cooking enthusiasm, and prepare your restaurant empire in every exotic restaurant in the world. It is not enough to improve your cooking abilities and control your time management skills to make your restaurant a five-star restaurant a better food and appliance!


Food Games
It seems that we all love playing with food, contrary to the commands of our parents. It’s not difficult to understand when you look at the delicious playing delights in IOS Games. If you’re hungry for a new culinary game for your iPhone or iPad, try your application store for these games. Or download all of them and have a virtual buffet for yourself.


Cafe Games
Build a restaurant for yourself, hire people and offer delicious desserts for you. Decide your business approach for coffee or restaurants and generate revenue even if you’re offline! Are you as fond of coffee as we do? Unleash your great barista power and make your guests bespoke coffee and tea drinks. Unlock unique coffee and spice everyone’s life with distinctive combinations of coffee drinks in your café.


Time management Games
In the IOS time management game, cook wonderful dinners and treats from across the world!. You may exercise your abilities in various settings and cooking styles with a large selection of distinctive venues and restaurants, from desserts and fast food to Indian and Chinese cuisine. Use hundreds of delectable ingredients to prepare recipes of high quality.


Features
● Travel across many countries!
● Cook and serve in different dining rooms!
● Conquer the level of creativity and addiction!
● Play with your buddies during Live Events!
● Join or create a team and play with worldwide teams!
● Feel a tremendous exotic flavor!
● Fast action fun! Fast action fun! New restaurant designs are just a tap away from new establishments!
● Complete the tasks of daily happiness to rest and rejoice!
● Have a quiet but fast-paced time!
● Make an eternal pleasure and enjoy your Cooking Craze!

We really appreciate it if you can take the time to rate us 5 stars and review for Food Voyage: Casual & New Cooking Games for Free in Cooking Madness

Follow Food Voyage on FB: http://www.facebook.com/FoodVoyageGame
